component.text:
Activity 1 â€“ Classify Routing Protocols

State or Path Vector to match each routing protocol to its classification. If you are correct, the word Correct! will flash on your screen. If you are incorrect, Please try again will flash. The pop up items will continue to display until all have been answered.

If you wish to complete the entire activity again, click Reset. Otherwise, proceed to Activity 2.

Activity - Part 1: Identify Components of a Routing Protocol - EIGRP

In this activity, you will focus on the operation of EIGRP, a distance vector routing protocol.

Read the statement at the top of the matrix. Next, drag a blue checkmark to the field (or fields) next to the items which accurately complete the statement. More than one of the items may be selected. Click Check to verify your answers. If correct, move to Part 2 of this activity. If incorrect, please Reset and try again.
In the area of data structure, EIGRP creates and maintains the ____________.
Best path(s) in the routing table
You have correctly identified the EIGRP data structure areas! Please continue to Part 2 of this activity.
You have not correctly identified the EIGRP data structure areas. Please click Reset to try again.

Activity - Part 2: Identify Components of a Routing Protocol - EIGRP

Read the statement at the top of the matrix. Next, drag a blue checkmark to the field (or fields) next to the items which accurately complete the statement. More than one of the items may be selected. Click Check to verify your answers. If correct, move to Part 3 of this activity. If incorrect, please Reset and try again.
In the area of routing protocol messages, EIGRP uses _________.
You have correctly identified the EIGRP routing protocol message types! Please continue to Part 3 of this activity.
You have not correctly identified the EIGRP routing protocol message types. Please click Reset to try again.

Activity - Part 3: Identify Components of a Routing Protocol - EIGRP

Read the statement at the top of the matrix. Next, drag a blue checkmark to the field (or fields) next to the items which accurately complete the statement. More than one of the items may be selected. Click Check to verify your answers. If incorrect, please Reset and try again.
To identify the best route to a network, EIGRP uses this algorithm:
You have correctly identified the EIGRP algorithm.
You have not correctly identified the EIGRP algorithm. Please click Reset to try again.
